title: Calories in a Chicken Burrito
meta_description: Discover calories in a burrito chicken, including total macros, protein, fat, carbs, and variations for your meal planning.
assumptions: Standard flour tortilla (10-inch), 4 oz grilled chicken, rice, black beans, cheese, salsa, no sour cream or guac.
disclaimer: Nutrition varies by brand, size, ingredients, and preparation; fast-food versions may differ. Check labels when available.

quick_answer.text: A standard chicken burrito has about 620 kcal and 32 g protein.

label_note: Totals mirror Nutrition Facts fields for easy comparison.

tweaks.label: Use corn tortilla instead of flour

faqs.q: How many calories in a burrito chicken from Chipotle?
faqs.a: Around 600-700 kcal depending on customizations; our estimate is 620 for a standard version.

faqs.q: What is the protein in a chicken burrito?
faqs.a: Typically 30-35 g from the chicken and beans.

faqs.q: Are chicken burritos high in sodium?
faqs.a: Yes, often 1000-1500 mg due to seasonings and cheese.

faqs.q: How to lower calories in a burrito chicken?
faqs.a: Skip rice, cheese, and sour cream; opt for whole grains and more veggies.
About 70 g mostly from the tortilla and rice.
